summary: Adds a book called Skyrim\'s Trainers, it spawns in Dragonsreach in Whiterun behind the guard to the right of the Jarl
descriptionHtml:
Adds a book called Skyrim\'s Trainers, it spawns in Dragonsreach in Whiterun behind the guard to the right of the Jarl. It gives information about skill trainers in Skyrim, their locations and services. Written with information from TES wiki.


How to install:
Extract zip file into TESV.exe directory or install using NMM.
author: Bluezone
